form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION, FORM ES-575

full_text: FORM ES-575 APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301.1 PART A-STATEMENT OF QUALIFICATIONS OF ALIEN (ES-575A) READ THIS NOTICE BEFORE EXECUTING FORMS ES-575A AND B To knowingly-furnis any false information in the preparation of this form and any supplement thereto or to aid, abet, or counsel another so to do is a felony punishable by $10,000 fine or five years in the penitentiary, or both (18 U.S.C. 1001). Any alien, prospective employer or any person acting on behalf of such alien or employer, who knowingly makes any misrepresentation concerning the alien, or his prospective employment including such matters as wages, hours, or the occupation in which an alien will be employed, or any person who falsely repre- sents, in the execution of this form that he is offering the alien employment as the prospective employer of such alien, will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. IDENTIFYING AND PERSONAL DATA 1. (Family name in capital letters) (First name) (Middle name) (Maiden name, if alien is a married woman) 2. SEX NAME OF ALIEN PAHWA VIDYA SAGAR Male Female 3. ALIEN'S BIRTHDATE 4. BIRTHPLACE (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) 5. PRESENT NATIONALITY OR CITI- Month Day Year ZENSHIP March 7, 1908 D. G. Khan Punjab Pakistan Indian 6. PRESENT ADDRESS (Number and Street) (City or town) (State and ZIP Code or Province) (Country) 7. IF ALIEN IS SEEKING CHANGE OF CLASSIFICATION GIVE TYPE OF VISA 6 Conant Street West Concord NOW HELD Massachusetts 01781 NONIMMIGRANT Class B-2 8. ADDRESS IN UNITED STATES WHERE ALIEN WILL RESIDE (Include ZIP Code if known) 9. KIND OF WORK ALIEN IS SEEKING 6 Conant Street West Concord Mass ) 01781 Engineer Civil, Plumbing Sanitary & Highways 10. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PROSPECTIVE EMPLOYER IF ALIEN HAS JOB OFFER 11. IS ALIEN CURRENTLY EMPLOYED? IF so, STATE PRESENT OCCUPATION. Greenleaf Associates 31 Cambridge Parkway Cambridge Mass Engineer Plumbing Design 12. EDUCATION AND TRAINING NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF SCHOOLS, DEGREES OR COLLEGES OR UNIVERSITIES FIELD OF STUDY FROM TO CERTIFICATES RECEIVED Government High School Matriculation 1914 1924 Matriculation Multan Punjab University PAKISTAN & School Leay- Multan College Multan Punjab Isc. ( Inter- 1924 1926 ing certificate University Pakistan mediate Science) I.sc certificat D. College Lahore Punjab 1927 1928 University Pakistan B SC (Bachelor- -Science) Bsc Ist year certificate Thomason Civil Engineering BSC Civil Eng- ineering 1928 1931 Civil Enginee College Roorkee India ring degree SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS 13. DESCRIBE SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS POSSESSED. DESCRIBE ANY SPECIAL SKILLS ALIEN POSSESSES AND PROFICIENCY IN THE USE OF TOOLS, MACHINES OR EQUIPMENT. LIST PROFESSIONAL LICENSES. Certified Engineer for working in the Public Works Department. Extensive Experience in designing economical Projects for Plumbing, water, sewerage and drainage and Fire utilities in factories and homes and building 14. GIVE ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CONCERNING ALIEN NOT GIVEN ELSEWHERE WHICH WOULD HELP ESTABLISH ALIEN'S QUALIFICATIONS. gs. Have worked under supervision of Vitro Engineering Company New York in their Nangal India fertilizer project, and CHEMICOS New York in their Bombay India fertilizer project. 15. LIST DOCUMENTS ATTACHED WHICH ARE SUBMITTED AS EVIDENCE THAT ALIEN POSSESSES THE EDUCATION, TRAINING, EXPERIENCE AND ABILITIES REPRESENTED. TYPEWRITTEN (I) Photostat copy of certificate of having qualified in Engineering Exami- nation and for working in the Public Works Department. High School, Isc certificates being below this have not been submitted, ENDORSEMENTS (MAKE NO ENTRY IN THIS SECTION-FOR GOVERNMENT AGENCY USE ONLY) O.T.&C. BOS e 1/21/69 SCHEDULE A BLANKET (SEE OVER)
